plot: Like so many other actors, Ava Gardner hated to watch her films. She said that the woman on the screen wasn't her. But all films tell two stories: the plot and the tale of the bodies filmed. This film narrates what happened between two images: a first shot of 'Pandora' and a first shot of 'Harem', the first and last movie filmed by the actress in Spain. Ava must certainly have thought that neither of these two women had anything in common with herself.   Written by  Anonymous
title: La noche que no acaba

write.role: novel &"Beberse la vida: Ava Gardner en España&"
write.name: Marcos Ordóñez
